listitem.para: This guide gave you a short introduction to &susemgr;. To discover more, refer to the other manuals available for &susemgr;. Find them at . Alternatively, access them from the &susemgr; Web interface by selecting Help from the top navigation bar.
On the Novell Wiki you can read articles about this product and add tips and tricks yourself. Find them at .

listitem.remark: emap: nothing happening on twitter. Only 58 follows, last tweet Nov. 2012. Shall we drop it?
listitem.para: Stay in contact with our Twitter account and get the latest news at .
For detailed information about the NCC, refer to the NCC guide available at .
For detailed information about &kvm; refer to the guide &kvmguide;, available at .
